comment: The Muslim who murdered the Scottish kid, Kriss Donald, has been given a poetry award while in prison. He gouged out Kriss Donald's eyes and set him on fire. RIP Kriss. I'll never forget what they did to you and how our establishment and media hushed it up.

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / give-01
            :ARG1 (a / award
                  :mod (p / poetry))
            :ARG2 (p2 / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Kriss"
                        :op2 "Donald")
                  :mod (r / religious-group
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Islam"))
                  :ARG0-of (m2 / murder-01

                              :mod (c / country
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Scotland")))
                        :time (b / be-located-at-91
                              :ARG1 p2
                              :ARG2 (p3 / prison)))))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (g2 / gouge-02
                  :ARG0 (h / he)
                  :ARG1 (e / eye
                        :part-of (p4 / person
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Kriss"
                                    :op2 "Donald"))))
            :op2 (s / set-on-fire-09
                  :ARG0 h
                  :ARG1 p4))
      :snt3 (w / wish-01
            :ARG1 (f / forget-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (t / thing
                              :ARG1-of (d / do-02
                                    :ARG0 (t2 / they)
                                    :ARG2 p4))
                        :op2 t
                        :manner-of (h2 / hushe-up-02
                              :ARG0 (a4 / and
                                    :op1 (e2 / establishment
                                          :poss (w2 / we))
                                    :op2 (m3 / media
                                          :poss w2))
                              :ARG1 (ii2 / it))))
            :time (e3 / ever)))
